sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FiAward, FiUsers, FiTrendingUp, FiShield, FiHeart, FiGlobe, FiTarget, FiStar } from 'react-icons/fi'; const About = () => { const stats = [ { icon: , value: '10,000+', label: 'Happy Customers' }, { icon: , value: '50+', label: 'Products' }, { icon: , value: '95%', label: 'Satisfaction Rate' }, { icon: , value: '25+', label: 'Cities Served' } ]; const values = [ { icon: , title: 'Quality Assurance', description: 'We ensure every product meets the highest quality standards before reaching our customers.' }, { icon: , title: 'Customer First', description: 'Your satisfaction is our priority. We provide exceptional service and support around the clock.' }, { icon: , title: 'Innovation', description: 'We continuously innovate to bring you the latest technology and best shopping experience.' }, { icon: , title: 'Excellence', description: 'We strive for excellence in everything we do, from product selection to customer service.' } ]; const team = [ { name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'CEO & Founder', image: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,', bio: 'Visionary leader with 15+ years in e-commerce and technology.' }, { name: 'Mike Chen', role: 'Head of Products', image: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,', bio: 'Product expert ensuring we offer only the best technology and gadgets.' }, { name: 'Emily Davis', role: 'Customer Success Manager', image: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,', bio: 'Dedicated to ensuring every customer has an amazing shopping experience.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About ShopSmart

Your trusted destination for premium electronics, fashion, and lifestyle products. We're passionate about bringing you the best shopping experience with quality, innovation, and exceptional service.

{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Mission Section */}

Our Mission

To revolutionize online shopping by providing an unparalleled selection of premium products, seamless user experience, and exceptional customer service. We believe that shopping should be enjoyable, convenient, and trustworthy.

Founded in 2020, ShopSmart has grown from a small startup to a leading e-commerce platform, serving thousands of satisfied customers across the country. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction drives everything we do.

{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

What drives us to deliver excellence every day

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

The passionate people behind ShopSmart

{team.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}
{/* Story Section */}

Our Story

2020

The Beginning

ShopSmart was founded with a vision to make online shopping simple, trustworthy, and enjoyable for everyone.

2021

Growth & Innovation

Expanded our product catalog and introduced innovative features like real-time inventory and personalized recommendations.

2022

Customer Excellence

Achieved 95% customer satisfaction rate and expanded to serve customers in 25+ cities across India.

2023

Future Forward

Continuing to innovate and grow, with plans for new categories, improved technology, and enhanced customer experiences.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Shop with Us?

Discover amazing products and enjoy a seamless shopping experience.

Shop Now Contact Us
); }; export default About;
